Package islandtrader.core

Class Upgrade

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.Tradable
islandtrader.core.Upgrade
public class Upgrade
extends Tradable
Represents an upgrade that the Trader can buy to equip their ship. The trader can also sell the upgrade to any store willing to buy it, in case the Trader needs more money.
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti

      Parameters:
      name - this Upgrade name
      description - this Upgrade description
      priceToBuy - this Upgrade price to buy
      priceToSell - this Upgrade price to sell
      idNumber - this Upgrade id number
      increaseEndurance - this Upgrade amount to increase in the Ship endurance
      increaseSneakiness - this Upgrade amount to increase in the Ship sneakiness
      increaseCargoCapacity - this Upgrade amount to increase in the Ship cargo capacity
      increaseSpeed - this Upgrade amount to increase in the Ship speed
